LanguageData.MorphineHigh.stages.slight_buzz.label: slight buzz
LanguageData.MorphineHigh.stages.slight_buzz.descript: Ah... yeah... things aren't as sharp anymore.
LanguageData.MorphineHigh.stages.warm_pudding_limbs.d: Yeah... that's the stuff. My limbs feel like warm pudding.
LanguageData.MorphineHigh.stages.pure_euphoria.label: pure euphoria
LanguageData.MorphineHigh.stages.too_comfy_to_care.de: Whoa... the walls are melting. ...uh... stay awake... nah, too comfy...
